titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on Liquid Crystal Device panel assemblies for use in Liquid Crystal Device projection type televisions.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/14/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2008, the duty on Liquid Crystal Device panel assemblies for use in Liquid Crystal Device projection type televisions.
